testcase.classname: feature to Test User Screen functionality
testcase.name: Verify the Pagination functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And User click on the Security Module.......................................passed And User Click on the Users screen..........................................passed Then By default ten records are displayed...................................passed And check whether it is navigating to the after page records when the user clicks on Next page icon.passed And check whether it is navigating to the before page records when the user clicks on before page icon.passed And check whether it is displaying the last page records when the user clicks on last page icon.passed
